query:
SELECT COUNT(*) as expense_count, SUM(amount) as total_expenses FROM expenses WHERE farmId = 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) as revenue_count, SUM(amount) as total_revenue FROM revenue WHERE farmId = 1;
